attributes.additional_details: If this gets enough signatures on it we will be able to keep the Den in its home! Please share this with everyone every signature counts!
attributes.background: Do not move Millwalls ground to do so would be tragic. Lewisham counsil and renewal are planning on developing in the area surrounding to do so would cause a huge dent in the historical value of the club and to south east London as millwill have been a big part of the growth in south burmondsey.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of Lewisham Council.

You can petition the council - you can find out more here:

http://www.lewisham.gov.uk/getinvolved/influence/Pages/Petitions.aspx
